e_weapon_reliability_melee.description: Choose a Killer Specialisation (Guns, Energy or Melee). The Reliability of all weapons your chosen class of weapon (Energy, Guns or Melee) change to Reliable.

effects.general_note: Your Melee weapon Reliability rating change to Reliable

e_weather_sense.name: Weather Sense
e_weather_sense.description: This is a related to the Danger Sense edge, though instead of detecting threats from people you gain the ability to sense approaching weather, and in particular, storms (see the previous chapter). The GM makes a Sandman (Perception) skill test with a Difficulty Level of 4+ on your behalf to see if you can warn others. Either way you always count as having at least Partial Protection from the storm, no matter which type!

effects.general_note: You can be pre-warned about approaching dangerous weather by the GM

e_weave_hardening.name: Weave Hardening
e_weave_hardening.description: All your hackable sliverware, Equipment and Weapons have Military-grade Encryption (Weaver skill of 9) instead of their normal rating.

effects.general_note: All your hackable sliverware Equipment and Weapons have Military-grade Encryption (Weaver skill of 9)

e_wrench_monkey.name: Wrench Monkey
e_wrench_monkey.description: You are fantastic at fixing and repairing, or otherwise jury-rigging broken hardtech. Any skill test using Weaver (Hardtech) to repair, modify or jury-rig vehicles or equipment get +4 dice. You cannot use this on vehicles or equipment that have taken three Wounds.

effects.general_note: You are an amazing Wrench Monkey and can jury-rig all sorts of hardtech

e_wyldworld_native.name: Wyldworld Native
e_wyldworld_native.description: As insane as this sounds, some people do scratch a living on the incredibly dangerous Wyld Worlds. Your family are some of them. You gain +2 dice to Wyld (Sense) and Wyld (Resistance), but you get -2 dice to Sandman (Perception) because you’ve learned not to trust what you see with your eyes.

effects.general_note: You are a Wyldworld Native

e_wyld_attuned.name: Wyld Attuned
e_wyld_attuned.description: Your link to the Wyld strong. Your Wyld damage is far easier to heal than most people. Anyone making an Echo (Nature) test to heal your Wyld damage gets +4 bonus dice to their test.

e_wyld_genes.name: Wyld Genes
e_wyld_genes.description: Your genetic structure has been exposed to sufficient Wyld radiation that it has altered in reality-twisting ways making you more in tune with the Wyld but less so with our reality. You get a bonus +2 dice to your Wyld and Echo skills, but -2 dice penalty to your Weaver skill.

effects.general_note: You have Wyld Genes and your genetic structure has been altered by the Wyld

e_wyld_hardening.name: Wyld Hardening
e_wyld_hardening.description: Your Wyld training has hardened you to the damaging effects of the Wyld. You get +1 to your Wyld Armour Value (max 6) and +2 dice to your Wyld (Resistance) skill.

e_wyld_intuit.name: Wyld Intuit
e_wyld_intuit.description: You have always been able to sense the ebb and flow of the Wyld and get +4 dice to your Wyld (Sense) skill.

e_wyld_surge.name: Wyld Surge
e_wyld_surge.description: With this Edge the maximum Magnitude you can activate is increased by two, however any time you Wyld, the Wyld is one level more severe (so a Minor Wyld becomes a Major Wyld and a Major Wyld becomes Catastrophic) if you have this Edge.

effects.echo_note: +2 max Magnitude but your Wylds are one level worse
effects.general_note: You have Wyld Surge and get +2 max Magnitude but your Wylds are one level worse

e_zero.name: Zero
e_zero.description: Not available to Echoes! You are completely immune to the direct effects of all Echo powers (and skill bonuses and penalties). You are not immune from secondary effects indirectly caused by the Echo power. The restriction is that you cannot have any cybernetic sliverware as they are reliant on Echotech to work. For example, if a Pyrokinetic Echo attacks your character with a plasma blast big enough to destroy the building your character is in they would be unaffected by the plasma attack itself, but not immune from the building falling on them.

effects.echo_note: You are completely immune to the direct effects of all Echo powers (and skill bonuses and penalties). You are not immune from secondary effects indirectly caused by the Echo power
effects.general_note: You are a Zero and are completely immune to the direct effects of all Echo powers (and skill bonuses and penalties). You are not immune from secondary effects indirectly caused by the Echo power

e_zoologist.name: Zoologist
e_zoologist.description: You have studied the biology, habitats and behaviour of animals and creatures extensively and are able to turn this knowledge to practical purposes. You get +4 dice to any Smarts skill tests to understand, or predict and shape animal/creature behaviour.

i_divinity_00.name: Avatar
i_divinity_00.description: This form is now host to My Magnificence! You're possessed! \nYour Pledged Disciple possesses your body for the next Scene and does whatever they want with it, then discard this Injury.

effects.injury_note: Your Pledged Disciple possesses your body for the next Scene and does whatever they want with it, then discard this Injury.

i_divinity_01.name: Crisis of Faith
i_divinity_01.description: My spirit is in turmoil! Your soul is cast into turmoil. \nYou get -2 dice to all Divinity skill tests.

i_divinity_02.name: Cult Attention
i_divinity_02.description: I am the target of an inquisition. Everything you do is under scrutiny. \nYou get -2 dice to all Smarts and Resources skill tests.

i_divinity_03.name: Touch of Death
i_divinity_03.description: Kali has marked me for death! You cannot spend Opportunity Points to heal Wounds or Injuries and you also get -1 dice to Wyld (Resistance) skill tests.

effects.injury_note: You cannot spend Opportunity Points on healing wounds or injuries until the Touch of Death injury is healed

i_divinity_04.name: Divine Charges
i_divinity_04.description: The Cult of the Tattooed Man has begun investigating me for heresy! The Wyld channels energy into you, reducing your protection. Your Wyld Armour Value drops by 1 level (minimum AV2).

i_divinity_05.name: Purge
i_divinity_05.description: I must purge myself of weakness. You need to restore your faith and purge yourself physically. \nTake a Physical Wound and you also get -1 dice to Physical (Endurance) skill tests.

i_divinity_06.name: Bad Luck
i_divinity_06.description: Today is not my lucky day… You cannot spend Opportunity Points to re-roll failed dice in skill tests.

effects.injury_note: You cannot spend Opportunity Points on skill rerolls until the Bad Luck injury is healed

i_divinity_07.name: Guilty Donation
i_divinity_07.description: Can money buy forgiveness? \nLet's find out. You are weak. Maybe money can make it better? \nTake a Resources Wound and you also get -1 dice to Resources (Network) skill tests.

i_divinity_08.name: Spiritual Fervour
i_divinity_08.description: My soul is so pure that everything feels so real. Reality becomes more intense. \nAll Smarts and Resources damage you take is doubled.

i_divinity_09.name: Apostate
i_divinity_09.description: I am cast into doubt! our soul calls out to another Disciple. \nTake a Smarts Wound and change your Pledged Disciple. \nAny Gifts from your previous Disciple cannot be used until you re-Pledge (heal this Injury).

effects.injury_note: Change your Pledged Disciple. \nAny Gifts from your previous Disciple cannot be used until you re-Pledge (heal this Apostate injury).

i_divinity_10.name: Corruption
i_divinity_10.description: I have a stain on my soul! Your connection to your Pledged Disciple is corrupted. \nLose a Divinity Opportunity Point (if you can), or take a Divinity Wound and Injury, then discard this Injury.

i_divinity_11.name: Heresy
i_divinity_11.description: I have been severed from my Pledged Disciple and declared heretic! You are unclean, branded heretic, and you cannot spend any Opportunity Points until this injury is healed.

effects.injury_note: You cannot spend Opportunity Points until the Heresy injury is healed

i_physical_00.name: Broken Rib
i_physical_00.description: That snapping sound Was not good, was it? The pain is intense. Even breathing hurts. \nTake a Smarts Wound and you get -1 dice to Smarts (Control) skill tests.

i_physical_01.name: Sprained Wrist or Ankle
i_physical_01.description: At least it's not broken! It's difficult to hold your weapons steady. \nYou get -2 dice to your Killer skill tests.

i_physical_02.name: Broken Arm or Leg
i_physical_02.description: Is it supposed to crunch like that? All your movement is halved, and you cannot sprint.

effects.injury_note: Movement speed halved, -1 Speed

i_physical_03.name: Heavy Bruising
i_physical_03.description: It looks worse than it is. Take a Resources Wound and you also get -1 dice to Resources (Network) skill tests.

i_physical_04.name: Dislocated Arm
i_physical_04.description: It popped out of the socket. \nCan I just pop it back in? It makes physical activity much harder. \nAll your Physical, Killer and Cloak skill test are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.injury_note: Physical, Killer and Cloak skill tests +1DL

i_physical_05.name: Head Trauma
i_physical_05.description: This is bad! I… [Collapses] You've lost consciousness and will stay unconscious until this injury is healed.

effects.injury_note: You have lost consciousness until this the Head Trauma injury is healed

i_physical_06.name: Puncture Wound
i_physical_06.description: It's not looking good and that sucking noise from my chest is not helping. Your Physical Wound Threshold is reduced by one (minimum one).

i_physical_07.name: Badly Winded
i_physical_07.description: I... I... ug... cannot... breathe. Your body is wracked by wheezing. \nYou get -2 dice to your Cloak skill tests.

i_physical_08.name: Armour Damage
i_physical_08.description: I got off lucky! Your Physical Armour Value for any armour you are wearing drops by one level (minimum AV2).

i_physical_09.name: Grotesque Wound
i_physical_09.description: Why is everyone staring at me and screaming? You're fine, but everyone who sees you immediately must make a 4+ Smarts (Control) skill test or take 5 Smarts Damage Dice! \nOn the plus side, you get +2 dice bonus to any Mouth (Intimidation) skill tests.

effects.injury_note: Everyone who sees your Grotesque Wound injury must immediately make a 4+ Smarts (Control) skill test or take 5 Smarts Damage Dice!

i_physical_10.name: Bloodied
i_physical_10.description: It's just a flesh wound... \na very bloody flesh wound. Your limbs are slippery with blood. \nYou get -2 dice to any defence skill tests.

effects.injury_note: You get -2 to all defence skill test due to the Bloodied injury

i_physical_11.name: Internal Bleeding
i_physical_11.description: I think I felt something inside burst… Lost a Physical Opportunity Point (if you can) or take a Physical Wound and Injury, then discard this injury.

i_resources_00.name: Financial Investigation
i_resources_00.description: What do you mean by 'financial irregularities'? You've boxed yourself in financially. \nLose a Resources Opportunity Point (if you can), or take an Resources Wound and Injury, then discard this Injury.

i_resources_01.name: Permit Revoked
i_resources_01.description: I do not want to hand back my gun! The government has revoked your license to buy and carry Restricted items. \nIt is illegal for you to buy or request Restricted Availability items.

effects.injury_note: It is illegal for your to buy or carry Restricted/Forbidden equipment or weapons until the Permit Revoked injury is healed

i_resources_02.name: License Revoked
i_resources_02.description: Guess it is a taxi for me then. Your piloting licenses have been revoked and it is illegal for you to drive or pilot any vehicle or drone.

effects.injury_note: Your piloting licenses have been revoked and it is illegal for you to drive or pilot any vehicle until the License Revoked injury is healed. Also drones will not fly for you

i_resources_03.name: Angry Quartermaster
i_resources_03.description: Who knew that filing form #392/J would make him so mad? You've pissed off logistics and now all your Availability tests to acquire mission equipment are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.injury_note: All your Availability tests to acquire mission equipment are one Difficulty Level harder until the Angry Quartermaster injury is healed

i_resources_04.name: Ostracised
i_resources_04.description: What do you mean I've been removed from the committee? You've been black-balled. \nYou get -2 dice to your Resources (Network) skill tests.

i_resources_05.name: Faux Pas
i_resources_05.description: Yes, the Governor is a fool. \nIs he is standing behind me? A bad case of foot-in-mouth! \nYou get -2 dice to your Mouth skill tests.

i_resources_06.name: Medical Care Suspended
i_resources_06.description: I guess I'll be patching this gunshot wound myself then. You cannot receive medical assistance from professional services. Only street doctors will treat you.

effects.injury_note: You cannot receive medical assistance from professional services. Only street doctors will treat you until you heal the Medical Care Suspended injury

i_resources_07.name: Stock Volatility
i_resources_07.description: Bear Milk futures have tanked. \nWe're going to be up to our ears in angry bears. Issues in the stock market have left you vulnerable. \nYour Resources Armour Value drops by one level (minimum AV2).

i_resources_08.name: Identity Stolen
i_resources_08.description: Apparently I just bought a dropship in Ravenna \nand an undersea base on Archimedes… Someone has stolen your identity! How could they? That's your identity! \nTake a Smarts Wound and you also get -1 dice to Smarts (Control) skill tests.

i_resources_09.name: Scandalised
i_resources_09.description: WeaveNet Now! has published details of our affair. \nThe Duke is going to be pissed… It is difficult to function socially like this. \nAll your Resources, Mouth and Vapour skill tests are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.injury_note: Resources, Mouth, Vapour skill tests +1DL

i_resources_10.name: Repossessed
i_resources_10.description: How does someone repossess my bioware? \nWith an axe? Uh-oh. Surely this is a mix up? \nYour Lifestyle drops one level.

i_resources_11.name: Sliverware Failure
i_resources_11.description: Is it supposed to smoke like that? One entire Sliverware Node of your choice (that you have at least one implant in) has malfunctioned.

effects.injury_note: One entire sliverware node has malfunctioned and will not work until the Sliverware Failure injury is healed

i_smarts_00.name: Tremors
i_smarts_00.description: Hacking this comm would not be so hard if my damn hands would stop shaking! Your hands are shaking so much it is difficult to use tech. \nYou get -2 dice to your Weaver skill tests.

i_smarts_01.name: Migraine
i_smarts_01.description: Somebody please turn off the sun... \nand shut up while you're doing it! The pain is making it difficult to think. \nAll your Smarts, Sandman and Weaver skill tests are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.injury_note: Smarts, Sandman, Weaver skill tests +1DL

i_smarts_02.name: Seizures
i_smarts_02.description: Ahh! Ug! Gah! our body convulses violently from the pain. \nTake a Physical Wound and you also get -1 dice to Physical (Endurance) skill tests.

i_smarts_03.name: Brain Freeze
i_smarts_03.description: Thoughts... confused... thinking... slowly… You get -2 dice to your Smarts skill tests.

i_smarts_04.name: Blurred Vision
i_smarts_04.description: Shoot him? Which one? Left or right? Everything is out of focus and you cannot tell friend from foe. \nYou get -2 dice to your Sandman skill tests.

i_smarts_05.name: Fear
i_smarts_05.description: Game over, man! Game over! \nWe are all going to dieeeeee! Terror overwhelms you. \nYour Smarts Armour Value is reduced by one level (minimum AV2).

i_smarts_06.name: Incoherent Babbling
i_smarts_06.description: Argh! Gah! You cannot make yourself verbally understood. \nYou cannot talk in character until this Injury is healed.

effects.injury_note: You cannot talk in character until the Incoherent Babbling injury is healed

i_smarts_07.name: Muddled Thinking
i_smarts_07.description: Was I coming or going? Lose a Smarts Opportunity Point (if you can), or take a Smarts Wound and Injury, then discard this Injury.

i_smarts_08.name: Cowardice
i_smarts_08.description: We have to run! RUN! Your palpable fear unnerves your companions. \nAll your companions get -2 dice to all Smarts (Control) skill tests when in your proximity (Short Range).

effects.injury_note: All your companions within Short Range (10m) get -2 to their Smarts (Control) skill tests due to your Cowardice injury

i_smarts_09.name: Panic
i_smarts_09.description: Oh shit! Oh shit! Oh shit! You are freaking out and become indecisive. \nYou get -2 dice to your Initiative skill tests.

i_smarts_10.name: Screaming
i_smarts_10.description: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH! You're uncontrollably screaming! \nYour companions (within Short Range) must make a 4+ Smarts (Control) skill test or take 5 Smarts Damage Dice! You also get -2 to any Cloak skill tests.

effects.injury_note: Everyone who hears your Screaming injury must immediately make a 4+ Smarts (Control) skill test or take 5 Smarts Damage Dice!

i_smarts_11.name: Catatonia
i_smarts_11.description: …! You're Stunned for 5 Conflict Rounds, or one Scene if not in Combat, then discard this Injury.

i_spacecraft_001.name: Armour Plating Damaged
i_spacecraft_001.description: The vehicle’s Armour Value drops by one level (minimum AV2). Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: The vehicle’s Armour Value drops by one level (minimum AV2)

i_spacecraft_002.name: Spacecraft Frame Damaged
i_spacecraft_002.description: The vehicle’s Wound Threshold drops by two and the vehicle loses two points of Physical. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: The vehicle’s Wound Threshold drops by two and the vehicle loses two points of Physical

i_spacecraft_003.name: Grav Drive Damaged
i_spacecraft_003.description: The Grav Drive is damaged and loses 5% Light Speed. Once the Spacecraft drops to 5% Light Speed or less the Grav Drive is inoperable. You cannot accelerate or decelerate with the Grav Drive and the spacecraft will lose 1% Light Speed per day. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: The Grav Drive is damaged and loses 5% Light Speed. Once the Spacecraft drops to 5% Light Speed or less the Grav Drive is inoperable. You cannot accelerate or decelerate with the Grav Drive and the spacecraft will lose 1% Light Speed per day

i_spacecraft_004.name: Primary Power Grid Damaged
i_spacecraft_004.description: Spacecraft's Action Cap drops by 1, Heat -2. Once Action cap hits 1 Primary Power Grid is offline. Can switch to Secondary Power Grid with an Engineering Action which restores the spacecraft to it's Action Cap -1 (Min 1), but doing so applies damage to Secondary Power Grid for this Injury instead. If Secondary Power Grid is also offline spacecraft shuts down and becomes dead in space.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft's Action Cap drops by 1, Heat -2. Once Action cap hits 1 Primary Power Grid is offline. Can switch to Secondary Power Grid with an Engineering Action which restores the spacecraft to it's Action Cap -1 (Min 1), but doing so applies damage to Secondary Power Grid for this Injury instead. If Secondary Power Grid is also offline spacecraft shuts down and becomes dead in space

i_spacecraft_005.name: Atmospheric Fuel Tank Damaged
i_spacecraft_005.description: If atmospherically capable, else reroll. spacecraft cannot manoevre in atmosphere.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot manoevre in atmosphere

i_spacecraft_006.name: Primary Batteries Damaged
i_spacecraft_006.description: If available spacecraft switches to Emergency Batteries. If they are also offline, the spacecraft cannot store generated energy and energy grid must be manually balanced. Spacecraft's Action Cap drops by 1.

effects.sc_injury_note: If available, spacecraft switches to Emergency Batteries. If they are also offline, the spacecraft cannot store generated energy and energy grid must be manually balanced. Spacecraft's Action Cap drops by 1

i_spacecraft_007.name: External Gantries Damaged
i_spacecraft_007.description: Movement around the outside of the spacecraft is one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.sc_injury_note: Movement around the outside of the spacecraft is one Difficulty Level harder

i_spacecraft_008.name: Ion Drive Damaged
i_spacecraft_008.description: Ion drive goes offline and spacecraft gets -4 to Speed.

effects.sc_injury_note: Ion drive goes offline and spacecraft gets -4 to Speed

i_spacecraft_009.name: Jump Drive Damaged
i_spacecraft_009.description: Spacecraft cannot generate its own jumpgate (but it can still use static jumpgates).

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot generate its own jumpgate, but it can still use static jumpgates

i_spacecraft_010.name: Landing Plasma Thrusters Damaged
i_spacecraft_010.description: If atmospherically capable, else reroll. Spacecraft cannot take off until fixed. All landing attempts are two Difficulty Levels harder.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot take off until fixed. All landing attempts are two Difficulty Levels harder

i_spacecraft_011.name: Medical Ward Damaged
i_spacecraft_011.description: Medical ward vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. All physical healing tests are one Difficulty Level harder due to lack of sterile environments.

effects.sc_injury_note: Medical ward vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. All physical healing tests are one Difficulty Level harder due to lack of sterile environments

i_spacecraft_012.name: Sanitation Processing Damaged
i_spacecraft_012.description: Toilets backup, waste water not processed. Danger of toxic gas buildup. All non-environmentally sealed crew at -2 dice to Physical skill tests.

effects.sc_injury_note: Toilets backup, waste water not processed. Danger of toxic gas buildup. All non-environmentally sealed crew at -2 dice to Physical skill tests

i_spacecraft_013.name: Secondary Power Grid Damaged
i_spacecraft_013.description: Spacecraft's Action cap drops by 1, Heat -2. If Primary Power Grid is also offline spacecraft shuts down and becomes dead in space.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft's Action cap drops by 1, Heat -2. If Primary Power Grid is also offline spacecraft shuts down and becomes dead in space

i_spacecraft_014.name: Sewage Tanks Damaged
i_spacecraft_014.description: Sewage flooding in a random section. All non-environmentally sealed crew must test for drowning and infection. Sanitary systems unavailable. All physical healing tests are one Difficulty Level harder due to lack of sterile environments.

effects.sc_injury_note: Sewage flooding in a random section. All non-environmentally sealed crew must test for drowning and infection. Sanitary systems unavailable. All physical healing tests are one Difficulty Level harder due to lack of sterile environments

i_spacecraft_015.name: Waste Heat Manifolds Damaged
i_spacecraft_015.description: Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat for each Spacecraft Action performed.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat for each Spacecraft Action performed

i_spacecraft_016.name: Water Tanks Damaged
i_spacecraft_016.description: Flooding in a random Crew Section. All non-environmentally sealed crew must test for drowning. Fresh water unavailable.

effects.sc_injury_note: Flooding in a random Crew Section. All non-environmentally sealed crew must test for drowning. Fresh water unavailable

i_spacecraft_017.name: Aerospace Wings and Control Surfaces Damaged
i_spacecraft_017.description: All Vapour (Aircraft) skill tests to pilot this spacecraft in atmosphere are one Difficulty Level harder .

effects.sc_injury_note: All Vapour (Aircraft) skill tests to pilot this spacecraft in atmosphere are one Difficulty Level harder

i_spacecraft_018.name: Cargo Pod Racks Damaged
i_spacecraft_018.description: A random carried piece of cargo or equipment is destroyed. Stored cargo is inaccessible. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: A random carried piece of cargo or equipment is destroyed. Stored cargo is inaccessible

i_spacecraft_019.name: Crew Quarters Damaged
i_spacecraft_019.description: Crew quarters vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Crew quarters vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_020.name: Docking & Landing Gear Damaged
i_spacecraft_020.description: Spacecraft cannot create fixed, load-bearing connection to other spacecraft or spacestations.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot create fixed, load-bearing connection to other spacecraft or spacestations

i_spacecraft_021.name: Landing Bay Damaged
i_spacecraft_021.description: Landing Bays vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. Cannot launch or recover other spacecraft.

effects.sc_injury_note: Landing Bays vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. Cannot launch or recover other spacecraft

i_spacecraft_022.name: Officers Quarters Damaged
i_spacecraft_022.description: Officer's quarters vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Officer's quarters vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_023.name: Oxygen Storage Damaged
i_spacecraft_023.description: Oxygen explosion! All passengers and crew in entire spacecraft must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. Starts an Oxygen Fire with Power 20, Pen 2! Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat per Conflict Round until fire is extinguished.

effects.sc_injury_note: Oxygen explosion! All passengers and crew in entire spacecraft must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. Starts an Oxygen Fire with Power 20, Pen 2! Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat per Conflict Round until fire is extinguished

i_spacecraft_024.name: Primary Life Support Damaged
i_spacecraft_024.description: If available ship switches to Emergency Life Support, else the atmosphere becomes toxic. all crew have 5 Conflict Rounds to get Breathers before they start to suffocate. Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat per Scene.

effects.sc_injury_note: If available ship switches to Emergency Life Support, else the atmosphere becomes toxic. All crew have 5 Conflict Rounds to get breathers before they start to suffocate. Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat per Scene

i_spacecraft_025.name: Reaction Mass Fuel Tanks Damaged
i_spacecraft_025.description: Spacecraft starts venting reaction mass, Spacecraft gets a -2 Stealth skill and -2 Speed.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft starts venting reaction mass, Spacecraft gets a -2 Stealth skill and -2 Speed

i_spacecraft_026.name: Thermal Capacitors Damaged
i_spacecraft_026.description: Spacecraft gets a -4 Stealth skill. Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat for each Spacecraft Action performed.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft gets a -4 Stealth skill. Spacecraft acquires 1 Heat for each Spacecraft Action performed

i_spacecraft_027.name: TransPods Damaged
i_spacecraft_027.description: TransPods inoperative, crew and passengers must use ladders to change decks.

effects.sc_injury_note: TransPods inoperative, crew and passengers must use ladders to change decks

i_spacecraft_028.name: Weave DataLooms Damaged
i_spacecraft_028.description: The spacecraft's AI has been terminated and your vehicle loses all its AI skills and Initiative.

effects.sc_injury_note: The spacecraft's AI has been terminated and your vehicle loses all its AI skills and Initiative

i_spacecraft_029.name: Atmospheric Intake Port Damaged
i_spacecraft_029.description: Spacecraft acquires 1 extra Heat for each Spacecraft Action performed when in Atmosphere.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft acquires 1 extra Heat for each Spacecraft Action performed when in Atmosphere

i_spacecraft_030.name: Cargo Conveyancers Damaged
i_spacecraft_030.description: Spacecraft cannot move cargo around or onload/offload cargo pods.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot move cargo around or onload/offload cargo pods

i_spacecraft_031.name: Defensive Weapon System Damaged
i_spacecraft_031.description: One defensive weapon system (Interceptors, for example) is inoperative. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: One defensive weapon system (Interceptors, for example) is inoperative

i_spacecraft_032.name: Degaussing Systems Damaged
i_spacecraft_032.description: Spacecraft begins to built up a dangerous magnetic hull charge. Spacecraft gets a -2 Stealth skill and -2 Speed and takes a 20 Damage Dice, Pen 3 EMP attack every 5 Conflict Rounds.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft begins to built up a dangerous magnetic hull charge. Spacecraft gets a -2 Stealth skill and -2 Speed and takes a 20 Damage Dice, Pen 3 EMP attack every 5 Conflict Rounds

i_spacecraft_033.name: External Drone Bay Damaged
i_spacecraft_033.description: One externally launched drone is destroyed and its bay rendered inoperative. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: One externally launched drone is destroyed and its bay rendered inoperative

i_spacecraft_034.name: Fuel Transfer Systems Damaged
i_spacecraft_034.description: The spacecraft cannot refuel itself or be used to refuel other vessels (including smaller craft in landing bays and drones).

effects.sc_injury_note: The spacecraft cannot refuel itself or be used to refuel other vessels (including smaller craft in landing bays and drones)

i_spacecraft_035.name: Grav Plating Damaged
i_spacecraft_035.description: Gravity fails internally. All crew and passengers must make 4+ Physical (Athletics) skill tests to move change compartments / move around the vessel. Movement speed for everyone onboard is halved.

effects.sc_injury_note: Gravity fails internally. All crew and passengers must make 4+ Physical (Athletics) skill tests to move change compartments / move around the vessel. Movement speed for everyone onboard is halved

i_spacecraft_036.name: Grav Repulsors Damaged
i_spacecraft_036.description: All Vapour (Aircraft) skill tests to pilot this spacecraft in atmosphere are one Difficulty Level harder. Spacecraft cannot hover.

effects.sc_injury_note: All Vapour (Aircraft) skill tests to pilot this spacecraft in atmosphere are one Difficulty Level harder. Spacecraft cannot hover

i_spacecraft_037.name: Inertial Compensators Damaged
i_spacecraft_037.description: Spacecraft cannot change direction while using Grav Drive without killing all passengers and crew. Attempting to change direction at maximum normal Speed all unsecured passengers and crew must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound per manouever.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot change direction while using Grav Drive without killing all passengers and crew. Attempting to change direction at maximum normal Speed all unsecured passengers and crew must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound per manouever

i_spacecraft_038.name: Wyld Fusion Reactors Damaged
i_spacecraft_038.description: Spacecraft's Wyld Shields and Wyld Jump Drive all begin to power down. The Spacecraft's Wyld Shield loses 1AV per hour and the ship can only make one more Wyld jump before exhausting its energy supplies

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft's Wyld Shields and Wyld Jump Drive all begin to power down. The Spacecraft's Wyld Shield loses 1AV per hour and the ship can only make one more Wyld jump before exhausting its energy supplies

i_spacecraft_039.name: Wyld Shields Damaged
i_spacecraft_039.description: Spacecraft's Wyld Shields collapse and the vessel is vulnerable to Echoes.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft's Wyld Shields collapse and the vessel is vulnerable to Echoes

i_spacecraft_040.name: Wyldstone Tokamak Tanks Damaged
i_spacecraft_040.description: The spacecraft starts venting dangerous Wyld Stone into space and inside the ship. All passengers and crew must make a 4+ Wyld Resistance skill test per Scene or take 1 Wyld Cancer! A second hit to the tokamaks causes the spacecraft to violently explode!

effects.sc_injury_note: The spacecraft starts venting dangerous Wyld Stone into space and inside the ship. All passengers and crew must make a 4+ Wyld Resistance skill test per Scene or take 1 Wyld Cancer! A second hit to the tokamaks causes the spacecraft to violently explode

i_spacecraft_041.name: Active Emissions Cancelling System Damaged
i_spacecraft_041.description: Spaceraft is one Difficulty Level easier to detect/sense with Active or Passive sensors. Heat +2.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spaceraft is one Difficulty Level easier to detect/sense with Active or Passive sensors. Heat +2

i_spacecraft_042.name: Ammunition & Loading Systems Damaged
i_spacecraft_042.description: Explosion! The spacecraft takes one hit with a combined Damage Dice of all it's Gun weapons with a Pen equal to the highest weapon Pen! After this all gun weapons are inoperative. Spacecraft takes 1 Heat.

effects.sc_injury_note: Explosion! The spacecraft takes one hit with a combined Damage Dice of all it's Gun weapons with a Pen equal to the highest weapon Pen! After this all gun weapons are inoperative. Spacecraft takes 1 Heat

i_spacecraft_043.name: Bar Damaged
i_spacecraft_043.description: The bar is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: The bar is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_044.name: Docking Control Damaged
i_spacecraft_044.description: Remote docking is not possible, the ship must be manually docked with other vessels/spacestations with all such Vapour skill tests one Difficulty Level harder. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Remote docking is not possible, the ship must be manually docked with other vessels/spacestations with all such Vapour skill tests one Difficulty Level harder. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_045.name: Food Stores Damaged
i_spacecraft_045.description: Much of the spacecraft's food stores are ruined, leaving all passengers and crew on emergency rations only.

effects.sc_injury_note: Much of the spacecraft's food stores are ruined, leaving all passengers and crew on emergency rations only

i_spacecraft_046.name: Galley/Mess Damaged
i_spacecraft_046.description: Galley/mess is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Galley/mess is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_047.name: Garage Damaged
i_spacecraft_047.description: The Groundcraft bay for vehicles and Power Armour is is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: The Groundcraft bay for vehicles and Power Armour is is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_048.name: Grapple & Towing Systems Damaged
i_spacecraft_048.description: The grapple and towing systems are inoperative. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: The grapple and towing systems are inoperative

i_spacecraft_049.name: Guest Quarters Damaged
i_spacecraft_049.description: Guest quarters vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Guest quarters vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_050.name: Hydroponics Damaged
i_spacecraft_050.description: The current crop in the hydroponics bay is ruined. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: The current crop in the hydroponics bay is ruined. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_051.name: MedBay Damaged
i_spacecraft_051.description: MedBay vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: MedBay vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_052.name: ORBIT Launch System Damaged
i_spacecraft_052.description: The ORBIT launch system is inoperative. The spacecraft cannot launch drop pods, ORBIT missiles or any other ORBIT systems.

effects.sc_injury_note: The ORBIT launch system is inoperative. The spacecraft cannot launch drop pods, ORBIT missiles or any other ORBIT systems
Spacecraft gets a -2 Sensor skill
Spacecraft gets a -4 Stealth skill

i_spacecraft_055.name: Engineering Control [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_055.description: There is an explosion in Engineering Control. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! Engineering control is inoperative and each primary system must be operated individually now.

effects.sc_injury_note: There is an explosion in Engineering Control. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! Engineering control is inoperative and each primary system must be operated individually now

i_spacecraft_056.name: Internal Comms & Weave Security
i_spacecraft_056.description: All central, internal comms go offline and secure doors become unlocked.

effects.sc_injury_note: All central, internal comms go offline and secure doors become unlocked
All internal sensors go offline

i_spacecraft_058.name: Navigation Array
i_spacecraft_058.description: The spacecraft's navigational array is inoperative, all attempts to navigate the spacecraft in real space or the Wyld are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.sc_injury_note: The spacecraft's navigational array is inoperative, all attempts to navigate the spacecraft in real space or the Wyld are one Difficulty Level harder

i_spacecraft_059.name: Navigation DataLoom
i_spacecraft_059.description: The spacecraft loses all navigational charts and data and must use an active Signal Fire connection (if in the Wyld) or Weave connection (if in system) to redownload all charts which will take at least a day.

effects.sc_injury_note: The spacecraft loses all navigational charts and data and must use an active Signal Fire connection (if in the Wyld) or Weave connection (if in system) to redownload all charts which will take at least a day

i_spacecraft_060.name: Poly-Mimetic Skin
i_spacecraft_060.description: Spacecraft cannot change it's colouring or appearance. Spacecraft gets a -2 Stealth skill.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot change it's colouring or appearance. Spacecraft gets a -2 Stealth skill

i_spacecraft_061.name: Primay Signal Fire
i_spacecraft_061.description: If available, spacecraft switches to Emergency Signal Fire. Else ship loses all interstellar communications and locks to Navigation Buoys and begins to drift.

effects.sc_injury_note: If available, spacecraft switches to Emergency Signal Fire. Else ship loses all interstellar communications and locks to Navigation Buoys and begins to drift

i_spacecraft_062.name: Repair Workshop
i_spacecraft_062.description: The repair workshop is inoperative. Weapons, equipment and vehicles carried by the spacecraft cannot be repaired centrally and must use disposable repair kits to repair.

effects.sc_injury_note: The repair workshop is inoperative. Weapons, equipment and vehicles carried by the spacecraft cannot be repaired centrally and must use disposable repair kits to repair

i_spacecraft_063.name: Sensor Array
i_spacecraft_063.description: Spacecraft Active Sensors go offline, Passive Sensors get -2 dice penalty.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft Active Sensors go offline, Passive Sensors get -2 dice penalty

i_spacecraft_064.name: Weapons Control [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_064.description: Central weapons control is hit. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! Weapons control is inoperative and each weaponry system must be operated individually now.

effects.sc_injury_note: Central weapons control is hit. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! Weapons control is inoperative and each weaponry system must be operated individually now

i_spacecraft_065.name: Brig/Prison [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_065.description: Brig/Prison is hit. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! All prisoners can escape.

effects.sc_injury_note: Brig/Prison is hit. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! All prisoners can escape

i_spacecraft_066.name: Cargo Bridge [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_066.description: Central bridge is hit and disabled all central cargo management. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. Cargo Loaders must be controlled individually now.

effects.sc_injury_note: Central bridge is hit and disabled all central cargo management. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. Cargo Loaders must be controlled individually now

i_spacecraft_067.name: Weave Control [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_067.description: Central Weave Control is hit and knocked offline. All central coordination of Sensors, Comms, Stealth and Navigation systems goes offline. All internal security systems go completely offline. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound!

effects.sc_injury_note: Central Weave Control is hit and knocked offline. All central coordination of Sensors, Comms, Stealth and Navigation systems goes offline. All internal security systems go completely offline. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_068.name: Command Centre [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_068.description: Command Centre (True Bridge) is hit. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound!

effects.sc_injury_note: Command Centre (True Bridge) is hit. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_069.name: Emergency Batteries
i_spacecraft_069.description: If available spacecraft switches to Primary Batteries. If they are also offline, the spacecraft cannot store generated energy and energy grid must be manually balanced. Spacecraft's Action Cap drops by 1.

effects.sc_injury_note: If available spacecraft switches to Primary Batteries. If they are also offline, the spacecraft cannot store generated energy and energy grid must be manually balanced. Spacecraft's Action Cap drops by 1

i_spacecraft_070.name: Gyroscopes & Stability Assistance
i_spacecraft_070.description: Spacecraft becomes unstable and prone to rolling, pitching and yawing. All Vapour skill tests to control vessel are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft becomes unstable and prone to rolling, pitching and yawing. All Vapour skill tests to control vessel are one Difficulty Level harder

i_spacecraft_071.name: Kitchen [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_071.description: The bar is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: The bar is vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_072.name: Launch Tubes
i_spacecraft_072.description: Spacecraft cannot launch external drones. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot launch external drones

i_spacecraft_073.name: Meeting Rooms & Offices [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_073.description: Meeting rooms and offices are hit. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. All conferencing must be virtual now :D

effects.sc_injury_note: Meeting rooms and offices are hit. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure. All conferencing must be virtual now

i_spacecraft_074.name: Navigation Bridge [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_074.description: Navigation Bridge (Visual Bridge) is hit. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Navigation Bridge (Visual Bridge) is hit. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_075.name: Registration & Traffic Control Centre [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_075.description: Spacecraft cannot automate docking procedures for itself or other spacecraft. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft cannot automate docking procedures for itself or other spacecraft. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_076.name: Weapon System [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_076.description: One weapon system is rendered inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound! Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: One weapon system is rendered inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_077.name: Airlocks & Sealed Hatches
i_spacecraft_077.description: One random airlock is destroyed. Anyone in it immediately takes a Physical Wound and is ejected into space! Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: One random airlock is destroyed. Anyone in it immediately takes a Physical Wound and is ejected into space

i_spacecraft_078.name: Armoury [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_078.description: Explosion! Spacecraft immediately takes 20 Physical DD, Pen 5 damage! All passengers and crew in location take TWO automatic Physical Wounds!

effects.sc_injury_note: Explosion! Spacecraft immediately takes 20 Physical DD, Pen 5 damage! All passengers and crew in location take TWO automatic Physical Wounds

i_spacecraft_079.name: Cargo Door
i_spacecraft_079.description: Cargo doors are damaged and cannot be opened to load/offload cargo.

effects.sc_injury_note: Cargo doors are damaged and cannot be opened to load/offload cargo

i_spacecraft_080.name: Emergency Signal Fire
i_spacecraft_080.description: If available, spacecraft switches to Primary Signal Fire. Else ship loses all interstellar communications and locks to Navigation Buoys and begins to drift.

effects.sc_injury_note: If available, spacecraft switches to Primary Signal Fire. Else ship loses all interstellar communications and locks to Navigation Buoys and begins to drift

i_spacecraft_081.name: Escape Pods [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_081.description: One random Escape Pod is destroyed. Anyone in it immediately takes a Physical Wound and is ejected into space! Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: One random Escape Pod is destroyed. Anyone in it immediately takes a Physical Wound and is ejected into space

i_spacecraft_082.name: Higgs Boson Particle Beam Injectors
i_spacecraft_082.description: The spacecraft goes into emergency shutdown and comes to a complete stop. All primary systems go offline and only Emergency and Secondary systems are operational. All Heat purged.

effects.sc_injury_note: The spacecraft goes into emergency shutdown and comes to a complete stop. All primary systems go offline and only Emergency and Secondary systems are operational. All Heat purged

i_spacecraft_083.name: Internal Cargo Bay
i_spacecraft_083.description: A random carried piece of cargo or equipment is destroyed. Internal Cargo Bay vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: A random carried piece of cargo or equipment is destroyed. Internal Cargo Bay vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_084.name: Internal Drone Stations
i_spacecraft_084.description: One internally managed drone is destroyed and its bay rendered inoperative. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: One internally managed drone is destroyed and its bay rendered inoperative

i_spacecraft_085.name: Magnetic Navigation Shields
i_spacecraft_085.description: Maximum Grav Drive Speed reduced to 10% Light Speed. Vessels Armour Value is reduced by 1 (minimum AV2).

effects.sc_injury_note: Maximum Grav Drive Speed reduced to 10% Light Speed. Vessels Armour Value is reduced by 1 (minimum AV2)

i_spacecraft_086.name: MedLab [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_086.description: Medical seals are broken, all experiments destroyed and all passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure.

effects.sc_injury_note: Medical seals are broken, all experiments destroyed and all passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_087.name: Wyld Field Inverters
i_spacecraft_087.description: All the spacecraft's Wyld Systems go into emergency shutdown and go offline: Wyld shields, Jumpgate Projectors, Wyld Sensors. Heat -2

effects.sc_injury_note: All the spacecraft's Wyld Systems go into emergency shutdown and go offline

i_spacecraft_088.name: Wyld Sensor Array
i_spacecraft_088.description: Spacecraft loses Wyld Sensors and is blinded in the Wyld.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft loses Wyld Sensors and is blinded in the Wyld

i_spacecraft_089.name: Altitude & Rangefinder Array
i_spacecraft_089.description: All Sensors skill tests are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.sc_injury_note: All Sensors skill tests are one Difficulty Level harder

i_spacecraft_090.name: Astronavigation Suite [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_090.description: Astronavigation Suite offline and Smarts (Knowledge) cannot be used to plan Wyld jumps, only Echo (Nature).

effects.sc_injury_note: Astronavigation Suite offline and Smarts (Knowledge) cannot be used to plan Wyld jumps, only Echo (Nature)

i_spacecraft_091.name: Drone Control [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_091.description: Mass drone control no longer possible. Drones must be controlled individually.

effects.sc_injury_note: Mass drone control no longer possible. Drones must be controlled individually

i_spacecraft_092.name: Emergency Storm Shelter [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_092.description: Emergency Storm Shelter is damaged but remains operational. If hit a second time it is destroyed, and all passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound.

effects.sc_injury_note: Emergency Storm Shelter is damaged but remains operational. If hit a second time it is destroyed, and all passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_093.name: Firing Range [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_093.description: Shrine/Temple is unusable. All passengers and crew must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound.

effects.sc_injury_note: Shrine/Temple is unusable. All passengers and crew must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_094.name: Gravitational Wave Array
i_spacecraft_094.description: All the spacecraft's gravitational systems go into emergency shutdown and go offline: Grav Drive, Grav Plating, Internal Compensators. Heat -2.

effects.sc_injury_note: All the spacecraft's gravitational systems go into emergency shutdown and go offline

i_spacecraft_095.name: Gym [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_095.description: Gym is unusable. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound.

effects.sc_injury_note: Gym is unusable. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_096.name: Secure Vault [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_096.description: Secure Vault is damaged but remains operational. If hit a second time it is destroyed.

effects.sc_injury_note: Secure Vault is damaged but remains operational. If hit a second time it is destroyed

i_spacecraft_097.name: Shrine/Temple
i_spacecraft_097.description: Shrine/Temple is unusable. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound.

effects.sc_injury_note: Shrine/Temple is unusable. All passengers and crew in location must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound

i_spacecraft_098.name: Tight-Beam Comms
i_spacecraft_098.description: Secure comms go offline. Any attempt to decrypt messages sent by this spacecraft are one Difficulty Level easier.

effects.sc_injury_note: Secure comms go offline. Any attempt to decrypt messages sent by this spacecraft are one Difficulty Level easier

i_spacecraft_099.name: Weapon Targeting Systems
i_spacecraft_099.description: All weapon attacks are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.sc_injury_note: All weapon attacks are one Difficulty Level harder

i_spacecraft_100.name: Weave Comms
i_spacecraft_100.description: Weave connection lost. Real-time in-system Weave communications are no longer possible, nor is is possible to establish a Weave connection to another vessel or external drone.

effects.sc_injury_note: Weave connection lost. Real-time in-system Weave communications are no longer possible, nor is is possible to establish a Weave connection to another vessel or external drone

i_spacecraft_101.name: Black Box
i_spacecraft_101.description: Spacecraft's black box and ID are destroyed.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft's black box and ID are destroyed

i_spacecraft_102.name: Echo Pod [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_102.description: Echo Pod is destroyed! Anyone in it immediately takes an automatic Physical Wound and is ejected into space!

effects.sc_injury_note: Echo Pod is destroyed! Anyone in it immediately takes an automatic Physical Wound and is ejected into space

i_spacecraft_103.name: Emergency Life Support
i_spacecraft_103.description: If available ship switches to Primary Life Support, else the atmosphere becomes toxic. all crew have 5 Conflict Rounds to get breathers before they start to suffocate.

effects.sc_injury_note: If available ship switches to Primary Life Support, else the atmosphere becomes toxic. all crew have 5 Conflict Rounds to get breathers before they start to suffocate

i_spacecraft_104.name: GenTanks [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_104.description: All GenTanks are destroyed, any passengers or crew in them are immediately Mortally Wounded!

effects.sc_injury_note: All GenTanks are destroyed, any passengers or crew in them are immediately Mortally Wounded

i_spacecraft_105.name: IsoLab [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_105.description: Isolation seals fail. Any biohazardous materials are released!

effects.sc_injury_note: Isolation seals fail. Any biohazardous materials are released

i_spacecraft_106.name: Observation Blister [COMPARTMENT]
i_spacecraft_106.description: Observation Bay vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound and be ejected into space, and test for Void Exposure. Can take this injury multiple times.

effects.sc_injury_note: Observation Bay vented to space and inoperative. All passengers and crew in location take an automatic Physical Wound and be ejected into space, and test for Void Exposure

i_spacecraft_107.name: Secure Transponder Node
i_spacecraft_107.description: Spacecraft is unable to encrypt any communications or positively identify its self to Identification Friend Foe systems and wil come up as "unknown target" on other spacecraft's sensors.

effects.sc_injury_note: Spacecraft is unable to encrypt any communications or positively identify its self to Identification Friend Foe systems and wil come up as "unknown target" on other spacecraft's sensors

i_vehicle_00.name: Engine/Reactor Hit
i_vehicle_00.description: The 'Check Engine Light' just exploded… The vehicle comes to a complete stop. \nIf this occurs after it has taken three Wounds the vehicle explodes!

effects.vehicle_note: The vehicle comes to a complete stop. \nIf this occurs after it has taken three Wounds the vehicle explodes

i_vehicle_01.name: Power Grid Ruptured
i_vehicle_01.description: Warning: power fluctuations detected! You're losing power. \nThe vehicle's Wound Threshold drops by two and the vehicle loses two points of Physical.

i_vehicle_02.name: Cargo Hit
i_vehicle_02.description: There goes the crates of Larescu Ale! A random carried piece of cargo or equipment is destroyed. \nIf it is a person, they take an Physical Wound.

effects.vehicle_note: A random carried piece of cargo or equipment is destroyed. \nIf it is a person, they take an Physical Wound.

i_vehicle_03.name: Pilot/Bridge Strike
i_vehicle_03.description: The Captain's been hit! The pilot (or everyone on the Bridge) takes a Physical Wound, then discard this Injury.

effects.vehicle_note: The pilot (or everyone on the Bridge) takes a Physical Wound, then discard this Injury

i_vehicle_04.name: Passengers Hit
i_vehicle_04.description: Warning: pressure loss detected in cabins. All passengers and crew must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, then discard this Injury.

effects.vehicle_note: All passengers and crew must make a 5+ Physical (Athletics) skill test or take a Physical Wound, then discard this Injury

i_vehicle_05.name: Out of Control
i_vehicle_05.description: I'm losing her! The pilot must immediately make a 5+ Vapour (Groundcraft, Aircraft or Spacecraft) skill test to bring the vehicle back under control again, then discard this Injury.

effects.vehicle_note: The pilot must immediately make a 5+ Vapour (Groundcraft, Aircraft or Spacecraft) skill test to bring the vehicle back under control again, then discard this Injury

i_vehicle_06.name: Drive System Damaged
i_vehicle_06.description: She's smoking! This vehicle gets a -4 Speed penalty.

i_vehicle_07.name: Steering Damage
i_vehicle_07.description: She's drifting wildly! All Vapour skill tests to pilot this vehicle are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.vehicle_note: All Vapour skill tests to pilot this vehicle are one Difficulty Level harder

i_vehicle_08.name: Weapon System Damaged
i_vehicle_08.description: Is it supposed to do that? A random weapon on your vehicle is knocked out and will require repair (the GM will decide)

effects.vehicle_note: A random weapon on your vehicle is knocked out and will require repair (the GM will decide)

i_vehicle_09.name: Armour Damaged
i_vehicle_09.description: That was close! I felt something scrape the hull plates. Several armoured plates have been sheared off. The vehicle's Armour Value drops by one level (minimum AV2).

i_vehicle_10.name: AI Offline
i_vehicle_10.description: Warning AI damage! \nWarning AI dam… [static]. The Vehicle's AI has been terminated and your vehicle loses all its AI skills and Initiative.

effects.vehicle_note: The Vehicle's AI has been terminated and your vehicle loses all its AI skills and Initiative

i_vehicle_11.name: Key System Taken Out
i_vehicle_11.description: That last hit took out our Jump Drive. Looks like we're going to have to fight out way out. One of your key systems has been compromised: Gravity, Life Support, Jump Drive, Grav system has been badly damaged and stops working (the GM will decide).

effects.vehicle_note: One of your key systems has been compromised

i_wyld_00.name: Wyld Glitching
i_wyld_00.description: My connection to the Wyld feels weaker. \nThis is going to be tough. The Wyld around you is glitching strangely. \nAll your Wyld and Echo skill tests are one Difficulty Level harder.

effects.injury_note: Wyld and Echo skill tests +1DL

i_wyld_01.name: Wyld Blindness
i_wyld_01.description: I cannot see the Wyld! You become Wyld blind. \nYou get -2 dice to your Wyld skill.

i_wyld_02.name: Wyld Burns
i_wyld_02.description: The Wyld is burning my flesh! The Wyld burns your flesh. \nTake a Physical Wound and you also get -1 dice to Physical (Endurance) skill tests.

i_wyld_03.name: Wyld Hallucinations
i_wyld_03.description: I am seeing strange memories of past and future. You can see possible futures and impossible pasts. \nTake a Smarts Wound and you also get -1 dice to Smarts (Control) skill tests.

i_wyld_04.name: Wyld Tethered
i_wyld_04.description: Something is peeling away my protection from the Wyld. The Wyld channels energy into you, reducing your protection. \nYour Wyld Armour Value drops by one level (minimum AV2).

i_wyld_05.name: Wyld Overload
i_wyld_05.description: My connection to the Wyld feels burned out somehow. Your connection to the Wyld is overloaded. \nYou get -2 dice to your Echo skill tests.

i_wyld_06.name: Wyld Glow
i_wyld_06.description: The good side of my eyes glowing is that now I do not need a torch. Your eyes and tattoo glow with Wyld energy! \nEveryone who sees must make a 4+ Smarts (Control) skill test or take 5 Smarts Damage Dice! On the plus side, you get +2 dice bonus to any Mouth (Intimidation) skill tests.

effects.injury_note: Everyone who sees your Wyld Glow injury must immediately make a 4+ Smarts (Control) skill test or take 5 Smarts Damage Dice!

i_wyld_07.name: Wyld Irradiating
i_wyld_07.description: I'm hotter than a fusion reactor, baby! Your body is emitting Wyld Radiation, harmless to you. Lethal to those around you. \nYou cause one Wyld Cancer per Scene to everyone else in proximity of you (Short range) who fails a 4+ Wyld (Resistance) skill test.

effects.injury_note: Anyone within Short Range (10m) of you must make a 4+ Wyld (Resistance) skill test or take 1 Wyld Cancer per Scene

i_wyld_08.name: Weakened Wyld
i_wyld_08.description: I... cannot... feel the Wyld! You can barely feel your connection to the Wyld. \nLose a Wyld Opportunity Point (if you can) or take a Wyld Wound and Injury, then discard this Injury.

i_wyld_09.name: Wyld Vortex
i_wyld_09.description: Oh. This cannot possibly be good. You create a Wyld vortex which channels away your power. \nThe maximum Magnitude you can Initiate is two less than normal.

effects.injury_note: The maximum Magnitude of Powers you can summon is two less than normal

i_wyld_10.name: Wyld Feedback
i_wyld_10.description: Overlords Beard! This hurts! You are getting more feedback than normal. \nYou take one extra Wyld Cancer for all new Echo Powers and one Damage Dice of Wyld damage on all Recalled powers.

effects.injury_note: You take one extra Wyld Cancer for all new Echo Powers and one Damage Dice of Wyld damage on all Recalled powers.

i_wyld_11.name: Dimensional Rift
i_wyld_11.description: Run! Run now! Some... thing... is approaching! You have attracted things from deep in the Wyld. \nTake a Divinity Wound and you also get -1 dice to Divinity (Faith) skill tests.

o_rank_list_pathfinders_12.name: The Emperor's Inquisitor / The First Inquisitor
o_rank_list_pathfinders_12.description: You are the The Emperor's Inquisitor / The First Inquisitor of the Imperial Pathfinders

effects.general_note: You are the The Emperor's Inquisitor / The First Inquisitor of the Imperial Pathfinders, you can requisition Restricted equipment and Forbidden equipment

s_aquashift.name: Aquashift
s_aquashift.description: Your body is adapted to underwater, high pressure or cold environments survival and you can survive indefinitely without penalty. You also have gills, so you can breathe normally underwater and automatically filter out any dangerous or toxic gases, so are unaffected by tear gas, stun gases, smoke inhalation or similar. You gain +4 dice to resist the effects of Cold or Pressure. You still require an air source.

effects.general_note: You are Aquashifted and can survive indefinitely underwater (and have gills), are immune to airborne toxins/drugs and get +4 dice to resist Cold or Pressure (even vacuum)

s_audiowire.name: Audio Wire
s_audiowire.description: You get +2 Perception skill Specialisation Points and the ability to detect infra-sound and ultra-high frequency sounds beyond the normal range of human hearing. Mostly useful for detecting explosions, earthquakes, nearby trains, or other auditory clues.

effects.general_note: Your AudioWire cyberware sliver implant lets you detect infra and ultra sounds

s_beautifier.name: Beautifier
s_beautifier.description: You are almost inhumanly beautiful, and you get +2 Resources Opportunity Points and anyone you engage in Social Interaction starts one level improved in your favour.

effects.mouth_note: All Social Interaction one level improved
effects.general_note: You have the Beautifier bioware sliver implant

s_biocore.name: Biocore
s_biocore.description: Biocore requires either the Genesculpting or Upper Social Class Edge to unlock. The Biocore adds additional organs and organ-like functions to the body. The Biocore implant network adds small pseudo organs into your abdominal cavity which give you +2 dice bonus to any Mortal Wound Survival tests you must make. When you have all six sub-implants: You also gain +2 dice to Stabilisation tests to stabilise you from a Mortal Wound as well.

effects.general_note: You have the Biocore bioware sliver implant

s_biosculpting.name: Biosculpting
s_biosculpting.description: Biosculpting requires either the Genesculpting or Upper Social Class Edge to unlock. Biosculpting is the art of enhancing the physiology of the user through genetic manipulation. The Biosculpting implant network can make you seem slightly ‘other’ and you get +2 bonus dice to your Intimidate skill Specialisation. When you have all six sub-implants: You get an additional +1 to your Physical Wound Threshold.

effects.general_note: You have the Biosculpting bioware sliver implant

s_bodystash.name: Body Stash
s_bodystash.description: You can store something up to pistol-sized inside your body undetectably.

effects.cloak_note: You can store an item up to pistol-size in your body
effects.general_note: You have the Bodystash cyberware sliver implant

s_bodyweb.name: BodyWeb
s_bodyweb.description: BodyWeb runs a secondary set of cybernetic nervous systems throughout the body allowing the implantation and control of body enhancements. The BodyWeb implant network allows for more precise controlling of your body’s autonomic functions and gives you +1 to your Physical Wound Threshold. When you have all six sub-implants you also gain +1 to your Smarts Wound Threshold.

effects.general_note: You have the BodyWeb cyberware sliver implant

s_brainbooster.name: Brain Booster
s_brainbooster.description: Additional links are built with nanofibers between your synaptic pathways which give you +2 Smarts Opportunity Points and +2 dice to any skill tests to carry out research.

effects.general_note: You have the Brain Booster cyberware sliver implant

s_chameleonfield.name: Chameleon Field
s_chameleonfield.description: You get +2 Sneak skill Specialisation Points, and the ability to change your skin colour and clothing (due to the optical field generated) at will. This can be done once per Scene as a Free Action.

effects.general_note: Your Chameleon Field bioware can change your skin colour and imitate different clothing once per Scene as a Free Action

s_chemjet.name: ChemJet
s_chemjet.description: You have an inbuilt automatic drug injector, can store up to ten different doses of drugs. You can take and receive the effects of one drug as a Free Action once per Conflict Round and can take one extra drug dose per Scene before you risk overdosing.

effects.general_note: Your ChemJet cyberware sliver implant stores 10 tabs of drugs and you can take 1 per Conflict Round as a Free Action and can take one additional drug before risking Overdose

s_cloneorgan.name: Clone Organ
s_cloneorgan.description: If you die a clone of you can be grown from this Clone Organ. The clone has all your memories and experiences (including Talent Points) up until the moment of death. Your clone will gain the additional Earned Trait: Clone (you still get 2 bonus Talent Points for receiving this Edge the first time).

effects.general_note: With your Clone Organ bioware sliver implant if you die you can be cloned from this organ (including Talent Points) up until death and clone gets the Earned Trait Clone

s_cnsbooster.name: Central Nervous System (CNS) Booster
s_cnsbooster.description: The CNS Booster increases your Initiative by +1 and gives you 2 extra Physical Opportunity Points as it speeds up your central nervous system, improving your reaction times.

effects.general_note: You have the Central Nervous System (CNS) Booster cyberware sliver implant

s_combatlink.name: CombatLink
s_combatlink.description: The CombatLink enables weaponry to act as an extension of your body. You get +2 to your Killer skill.

effects.general_note: You have the CombatLink cyberware sliver implant

s_decentralisedheart.name: Decentralised Heart
s_decentralisedheart.description: Triples your survival time in Mortally Wounded damage level and adds +2 dice to any Weaver (Medic) skill test to stabilise you.

effects.general_note: Your Decentralised Heart bioware sliver implant triples your survival time in Mortally Wounded damage level and adds +2 dice to any Weaver (Medic) skill test to stabilise you

s_decrypter.name: Decrypter
s_decrypter.description: Allows you to decrypt nearby comm signals and feeds from electronics. You get +2 to any Weaver skill tests for cracking, encrypting, or jamming nearby communications. Also your communications are better encrypted, and you get +2 dice bonus to all your hackable sliverware’s encryption values.

effects.general_note: Your Decrypter cyberware sliver implant gives all your Sliverware +2 bonus dice to resist hacking

s_dermalplate.name: Dermal Plate
s_dermalplate.description: Implanted reactive carbon nanotube implants give you a Physical Armour Value of 4 without the bulkiness of traditional armour.

effects.general_note: You have the Dermal Plate cyberware sliver implant

s_dns.name: Decentralised Nervous System (DNS)
s_dns.description: Secondary hubs for your nervous system are integrated into your body which give you +1 to your Physical Wound Threshold.

effects.general_note: You have the Decentralised Nervous System (DNS) bioware sliver implant

s_dronelink.name: DroneLink
s_dronelink.description: AI/Encryption: Military. Designed to allow you to directly interface with multiple drones, vehicles, and security system the DroneLink gives you these abilities and bonuses: 1. You get +2 dice to any Weaver (Hacking) skill tests to hack or modify drones. 2. You can directly pilot (via weave connection) one vehicle or drone plus as many vehicles/drones as you have Resources Opportunity Points skill using your Outer skills and the vehicle or drone’s Core skills. 3. You can issue commands to all your drones under your command to carry out as a Free Action once per Conflict Round with no limit to the number of vehicles or drones if you give the same general order to them all. Additional orders cost actions as normal.

effects.general_note: Your DroneLink cyberware sliver implant lets you directly control a number of drones equal to your Hacking Specialisation and can issue one command per Conflict Round as a Free Action to all your drones

s_eagleeye.name: Eagle Eye
s_eagleeye.description: You get +2 to your Sandman skill and can optically zoom up to 100x either for long distance view or microscopic view.

effects.general_note: Your enhanced Eagle Eye cybernetic sliver vision has 100x zoom

s_ecmcloak.name: ECM Cloak
s_ecmcloak.description: You get +2 to your Cloak skill, the Electronic Counter Measure cloak makes you invisible to the TacLink free aim bonus and it gives you an additional +2 dice in any opposed skill test to avoid being detected with sensors.

effects.general_note: You have the Electronic Counter Measure (ECM) bioware sliver implant

s_escapegas.name: Escape Gas
s_escapegas.description: You can release a nano hive-produced, genetically-tailored airborne version of the toxins Virulan or Milk Drops – your choice – that effects everyone within Short Range (10 metres), except you, who is not in environmentally sealed armour or does not have the Aquashift implant. This ability can be used once permission and you are immune to your own effects, though Virulan or Milk Drops from another source effect you normally.

effects.general_note: With the Escape Gas bioware sliver implant you can release a version of Virulan or Milk Drops once per mission that effects everyone within 5m and you are immune to your own versions

s_forensicscanner.name: Forensic Scanner
s_forensicscanner.description: AI/Encryption: Security. You get +2 dice to any Sandman skill tests for forensically examining a scene. You can accurately scan fingerprints, take crime scene recordings, and perform basic crime scene analysis all with a visual scan only.

effects.general_note: You have the Forensic Scanner cyberware sliver implant

s_godlink.name: GodLink
s_godlink.description: The GodLink is a special religious implant that ties you in more closely to your Pledged Disciple and gives you an extra Divinity Opportunity Point and +1 Divinity Armour Value. Even an individual Mook can spend the Divinity Opportunity if they have a GodLink.

effects.general_note: You have the GodLink cyberware sliver implant

s_headlink.name: HeadLink
s_headlink.description: HeadLink is a network of cybernetic implants fitted to enhance cognitive abilities. With the HeadLink implant network you can link into a tactical Weave that monitors your status and shares targeting information and other relevant info between members of the same team. You get a +1 dice bonus to your Initiative. When you have all six sub-implants the Initiative bonus increases to +2 dice.

effects.general_note: You have the HeadLink cyberware sliver implant

s_magnaview.name: Magnaview
s_magnaview.description: You get +2 Aircraft skill Specialisation Points, and the ability to see magnetic fields in the air. You can use this ability to detect electrical systems within 50m with a successful Sandman (Perception) skill test.

effects.general_note: With the MagnaView bioware sliver implant you can detect electrical systems within 50m with a successful Sandman (Perception) skill test

s_monoclaws.name: Monoclaws
s_monoclaws.description: You get an implanted weapon, uses Killer (Melee): Acc: 0, Rel: Reliable, ROF: Single, Range: Point, DD: Physical +2, Pen: 1. The Monoclaws can be quick drawn and used in a single action. When retracted the Monoclaws cannot be detected except with a medi-scanner.

effects.general_note: You have the Monoclaws cyberware sliver implant,uses Killer (Melee)

s_musclefibers.name: MuscleFibers
s_musclefibers.description: You get +1 to your Physical Wound Threshold and can run twice as long as a normal human without tiring and your Speed is 2.

effects.general_note: You have the MuscleFibers bioware sliver implant

s_nanoarmour.name: Nanoarmour
s_nanoarmour.description: Your skin has a nanoweave that effectively disperses the damaging energy of attacks and you get +1 Physical Armour Value that stacks with other implanted armour but cannot go above Physical AV6.

effects.general_note: You have the Nanoarmour bioware sliver implant

s_nanocore.name: Nanocore
s_nanocore.description: Nanocore requires either the Genesculpting or Upper Social Class Edge to unlock. The Nanocore is a hive for nanites that can perform a range of functions that go beyond what simple cybernetics of genetics are capable of. The Nanocore implant network equips you with several hives of nanomachines in your body and this gives you +2 dice to resist harmful drug and toxin effects. When you have all six sub-implants: you can extend your nanites into the area around you creating a virtual energy shield that gives you +2 AV bonus (max Resources AV6) to resisting EMP attacks.

effects.general_note: You have the Nanocore bioware sliver implant

s_nanoregen.name: Nanoregen
s_nanoregen.description: You automatically heal one Wound of Physical damage or Injury per Scene (your choice). The Nanoregen can also regrow lost fingers and toes in a day and limbs, ears, and noses in one Mission. It cannot regrow other organs.

effects.general_note: With the Nanoregen bioware sliver implant you automatically heal one Physical Wound or Physical Injury (your choice) per scene

s_nbsu.name: Nano Biostatus Unit (NBSU)
s_nbsu.description: AI/Encryption: Military. The Nano Biostatus Unit treats you automatically with first aid at the end of combat if you have taken damage with its Weaver (Medic) skill of 9. It requires one full uninterrupted Conflict Round to perform first aid. As well as automatic first aid, the NBSU can make a Weaver (Medic) skill test to stabilise you if you are Mortally Wounded.

effects.general_note: The Nano BioStatus Unit (NBSU) bioware sliver implant automatically treats your wounds (and stabilises you when Mortally Wounded) with a Weaver (Medic) skill of 9

s_nervelink.name: NerveLink
s_nervelink.description: You can interface with a person’s nervous system or machine’s systems by touching your bare hand to your target and extending nanofibers.
